# in seconds
TIME_LIMIT=1000

# No postprocessing
CERTIFICATION=NO

# Display traces in terminal
TRACE=YES

# Absolute tolerance on the width of intervals
VAR_ABS_TOL=1e-10

# Limit on the depth of nodes of search tree
DEPTH_LIMIT=1000

# Limit on the number of nodes generated by the solving algorithm
NODE_LIMIT=1000000

#
